location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, sent with copies of a proclamation (not included in the volume) declaring that the port of Mocho [Al-Mukhā], and all other places belonging to the Imam of Sanna [Ṣanʻā'] in the Gulf of Arabia are in a state of blockade until further orders.
